Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the computer, and check emails.
Review emails. Address any questions regarding the automated validation rule testing report.

Develop a plan for performing regular audits of abstracted data. Include details such as sample size, data elements to be audited, and auditing procedures. Discuss the auditing plan with @HIS-1, @MRS-1, and @DA-1. Topic: Auditing Plan for Abstracted Data
Prepare audit checklists and templates for documenting audit findings. Customize the checklists based on the data elements being audited.

Begin the initial audit of abstracted data. Select a sample of medical records based on criteria discussed with @HIS-1 and @MRS-1 (e.g., records with specific diagnoses or procedures). Cross-reference the abstracted data against the source documents.
Continue auditing abstracted data, documenting any inaccuracies or discrepancies found. Focus on data elements related to medication orders and lab results.
Analyze the audit findings. Identify common types of errors or patterns in the abstracted data.

Discuss audit findings with @MRS-1 and @HIS-1 to determine the root causes of the inaccuracies. Brainstorm potential solutions for preventing future errors. Topic: Review and Discussion of Data Audit Findings

Prepare a report summarizing the audit findings, including the types and frequency of errors identified, the root causes of the errors, and recommended corrective actions. Send it to @Clinlead-1, @ITPM-1, @DA-1, @MRS-1, and @HIS-1 for review. Topic: Abstracted Data Audit Report
Update the task progress in the project management system. Prepare for tomorrow's tasks.
